channel.title: How would i..?
channel.description:
ok so im working on redoing the slayer in my server.
and instead of these retarted chests. i want to know how to give slayer xp when a monster dies.
like what kind of code would put, and where? also im going to make where you need the enchanted gem in your invatory to gain xp, if not. you get a message saying you require a gem to gain xp.
if anyone can help, that would be fantastic

item.title: How would i..?
item.dc:creator: @Thecheeseman11 Thecheeseman11
item.description:
@Thecheeseman11 wrote:

Like I said, it won’t necessarily make it when you kill the monster, but as far as I know, thats a whole nother concept.

Read full topic

item.title: How would i..?
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

i;k[quote=“Thecheeseman11, post:2, topic:229280”]I might be able to help somewhat.

Delete the whole XP for chest thing
Find where you get XP for strength or something while fighting a monster,
Copy paste the line for the XP
Change the C/P’ed 1 to Slayer XP.
Not really sure on how to make it for when the monster dies.
I don’t know if it’ll help much but I tried

DONT FORGET TO HAVE A BACKUP FILE OF ANYTHING YOU CHANGE JUST INCASE YOU GET ERRORS[/quote]

mmk, i’ll try it. and i’ll play around with it a bit thanks for the help.
if there is a simpler way, feel free to post!

Read full topic
